summary: Greece, WWII: two enemy Colonels, one Italian and the other English, develop a grudging friendship which will be put to test by the war.
cast: Totò|Walter Pidgeon|Nino Taranto|Scilla Gabel|Toni Ucci|Adriana Facchetti|Nino Terzo|Francis Lane|Sergio Bixio|Giancarlo Maestri|Gérard Herter|Andrea Scotti|Nino Nini|Adriano Buzzanca|Antonio Devi|Jack West|Roland Bartrop|Eleonora Gery|Franco Lantieri|Mimmo Poli
title: I due colonnelli
